00031 
00032 #include <calvin_files/writers/src/CalvinCHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter.h>
00033 #include <calvin_files/data/src/ProbeSetQuantificationDetectionData.h>
00034 
00035 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00036 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_data;
00037 
00038 /*! This class provides an easy to use wrapper to creating expression signal/detection CHP files. */
00039 class ExpressionSignalDetectionWriter
00040 {
00041 private:
00042         /*! The data object. */
00043         CHPQuantificationDetectionData *pdata;
00044 
00045 public:
00046         /*! Constructor */
00047         ExpressionSignalDetectionWriter();
00048 
00049         /*! Destructor */
00050         ~ExpressionSignalDetectionWriter();
00051 
00052         /*! Prepends the required tag to the name of an algorithm parameter.
00053          * @param param The parameter to modify.
00054          */
00055         static void PrependAlgorithmParameterNameTag(ParameterNameValueType &param);
00056         
00057         /*! Prepends the required tag to the name of an algorithm option parameter.
00058          * @param param The parameter to modify.
00059          */
00060         static void PrependAlgorithmParameterOptionNameTag(ParameterNameValueType &param);
00061 
00062 private:
00063         /*! Add the CEL header to the CHP object.
00064          * @param celFileName The name of the CEL file (full path)
00065          */
00066         void AddCELHeader(const std::string &celFileName);
00067         
00068         /*! Add the algorithm information to the CHP object.
00069          * @param algname The algorithm name.
00070          * @param algversion The algorithm version
00071          * @param progname The program name
00072          * @param progversion The program version
00073          * @param progcompany The company name.
00074          */
00075         void AddAlgorithmInformation(const wchar_t *algname, const wchar_t *algversion, const wchar_t *progname, const wchar_t *progversion, const wchar_t *progcompany);
00076         
00077         /*! Add the array information to the CHP object.
00078          * @param nsets The number of probe sets
00079          * @param maxLen The maximum length of the probe set names
00080          * @param arrayType The probe array type
00081          */
00082         void AddArrayInfo(int nsets, int maxLen, const wchar_t *arrayType);
00083         
00084         /*! Add the parameters to the CHP object.
00085          * @param params The parameters to add
00086          * @param storeAsParams True if stored as a parameter, false if stored as a summary metric.
00087          */
00088         void AddParameters(const ParameterNameValueTypeList &params, bool storeAsParams);
00089 
00090 public:
00091         /*! Add the algorithm information to the CHP object.
00092          * @param celFileName The name of the CEL file (full path)
00093          * @param chpFileName The name of the CHP file to write (full path)
00094          * @param algname The algorithm name.
00095          * @param algversion The algorithm version
00096          * @param progname The program name
00097          * @param progversion The program version
00098          * @param progcompany The company name.
00099          * @param arrayType The probe array type
00100          * @param algParams The algorithm parameters
00101          * @param summaryParams The summary metrics
00102          * @param psnames The probe set names
00103          * @param signals The signal values
00104          * @param pvalues The p-values
00105          */
00106         void WhiteExpressionSignalDetectionCHPFile(
00107                         const std::string &celFileName,
00108                         const std::string &chpFileName,
00109                         const std::wstring &algname,
00110                         const std::wstring &algversion,
00111                         const std::wstring &progname,
00112                         const std::wstring &progversion,
00113                         const std::wstring &company,
00114                         const std::wstring &arrayType,
00115                         const ParameterNameValueTypeList &algParams,
00116                         const ParameterNameValueTypeList &summaryParams,
00117                         const std::list<std::string> &psnames,
00118                         const std::list<float> &signals,
00119                         const std::list<float> &pvalues);
00120 };
